about_the_game:
As a celestial being, it is your task to travel across dimensions and deconstruct the old ones. In this cozy and relaxing game, you'll recycle objects from fractured worlds to create a tranquil haven of your own.

Features

  • 📦Explore and Gather: Venture into shattered dimensions, collect unique resources by dismantling objects.
  • 🚀Upgrade and Expand: Enhance your tools and boost your recycling prowess to take on bigger challenges.
  • 🌴Create Your Oasis: Build your own dimension by utilizing the power of building, crafting and farming
  • 👋Lend a Hand: Assist the inhabitants of other dimensions, spreading peace and harmony across the cosmos

Rediscover the beauty in broken worlds and craft a sanctuary of serenity. The adventure awaits!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Dimensional Deconstruction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Dimensional deconstruction is a cozy sandbox game where you transform fractured dimensions into a personalized sanctuary. Recycle, rebuild, and create the home of your dreams!
